amendment.description: To provide a termination date for the Small Business Competitiveness Demonstration Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1538 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12779) To provide a termination date for the Small Business Competitiveness Demonstration Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1538 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe.
